titles.title: A bill for the relief of Sascha Glade Weinzheimer, Jean Weinzheimer Jansen, Doris Alexa Weinzheimer, Walter Richard Weinzheimer, and the estate of Walter Weinzheimer.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/16/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to four named individuals and a named estate in full satisfaction of all claims for physical loss or destruction of property in the Philippines and for detention benefits arising under the War Claims Act of 1948.
